message.body: Yo what's your words with friends username?
Okay, cool. Also, anything on your bday/xmas wish list yet?
Oh no...i'm not sure i can provide that. You guys trying to get rid of pat?
Not trying. He'll be out by the end of November
He got fired from his job a few weeks ago
Wow...well if i hear of anyone looking for a place in pittsfield i'll let you know...my network isn't very extensive there though..
And if you think of anything let me know...or tell mom and dad
Actually I have an idea. Cloud Atlas. It's a novel
Ahh yes dan and i saw the movie last week i know exactly what you're talking about
Yeah i saw it last week too. I definitely wanna read the book now
